summary: A house in Whiterun, just behind Dragon's Reach
descriptionHtml:
Thought I made my own home in Skyrim. Found out about Hearthfire, and have been itching about making my own, lore-friendly, home.

The house is located in Whiterun, exterior of Dragon's Reach. For now, it's shown on the map and I have no idea how to set it to *getting discovered*.
I added a vendor in the house, Kahjiit. He sells alcoholic beverages and a couple of food (food is for the purpose of "Realistic Needs and Diseases").

The house, the design, and the bits in it is still incomplete. I don't know what I'm missing, but I'm feeling so. I'd really appreciate some inputs on making it a better lore-friendly home.

Currently, I plan on making some kind of a treasure hunt without the need for activations (quests)
Just make some notes, just like the one you may find on the doorstep of Wilderhome

I'm staying away from:
Vendor being able to buy (although if you want to earn some gold from him, change/add gold to his vending items)
Alchemy lab
Enchanting table

This is my first mod ever created, and decided I share my piece.

I suggest these mods that I can't play without:
Realistic Needs and Diseases
Frostfall
Realistic Lighting Overhaul
Drinking Gives You Bottles
author: xxviiith
